metadata.name: Suspicious Execution of Shutdown
metadata.comment: Use of the commandline to shutdown or reboot windows

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\shutdown.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/s '))))

output.summary: Use of the commandline to shutdown or reboot windows
